mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_RATINGS ( TOPICNO, POSTNO, RATEDBY, RATING_FLG, RATEDAT ) VALUES ( #{topicNo}, #{postNo}, #{user.id}, #{rating}, CURDATE() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE RATING_FLG = #{rating}, RATEDAT = CURDATE()
mapper.select: SELECT TOPICS.TOPICNO AS topicNo, TOPICS.SUBJECT AS subject, TOPICS.CREATEDBY AS topicCreatedBy, TOPICS.CREATEDAT AS topicCreatedAt, POSTS.POSTNO AS postNo, POSTS.POST AS postText, POSTS.POST_IMG AS postImg, POSTS.CREATEDBY AS postCreatedBy, U.NAME AS postCreatedUsername, U.PROFILE_IMG AS postCreatedUserImage, POSTS.CREATEDAT AS postCreatedAt, POST_RATINGS.RATEDBY AS postRatedBy, POST_RATINGS.RATING_FLG AS postRating, POST_RATINGS.RATEDAT AS postRatedAt FROM TOPICS INNER JOIN POSTS ON TOPICS.TOPICNO = POSTS.TOPICNO INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.ID = POSTS.CREATEDBY AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USERS WHERE ID = POSTS.CREATEDBY AND AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > U.AVF ) LEFT OUTER JOIN POST_RATINGS ON POSTS.TOPICNO = POST_RATINGS.TOPICNO AND POSTS.POSTNO = POST_RATINGS.POSTNO WHERE U.AVF <= CURDATE() AND TOPICS.TOPICNO = #{topicNo} ORDER BY TOPICS.TOPICNO, POSTS.POSTNO

SELECT TOPICS.TOPICNO AS topicNo, TOPICS.SUBJECT AS subject, TOPICS.CREATEDBY AS topicCreatedBy, TOPICS.CREATEDAT AS topicCreatedAt, POSTS.POSTNO AS postNo, POSTS.POST AS postText, POSTS.POST_IMG AS postImg, POSTS.CREATEDBY AS postCreatedBy, U.NAME AS postCreatedUsername, U.PROFILE_IMG AS postCreatedUserImage, POSTS.CREATEDAT AS postCreatedAt, POST_RATINGS.RATEDBY AS postRatedBy, POST_RATINGS.RATING_FLG AS postRating, POST_RATINGS.RATEDAT AS postRatedAt FROM TOPICS INNER JOIN POSTS ON TOPICS.TOPICNO = POSTS.TOPICNO INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.ID = POSTS.CREATEDBY AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USERS WHERE ID = POSTS.CREATEDBY AND AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > U.AVF ) LEFT OUTER JOIN POST_RATINGS ON POSTS.TOPICNO = POST_RATINGS.TOPICNO AND POSTS.POSTNO = POST_RATINGS.POSTNO
U.AVF <= CURDATE()
AND TOPICS.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subjectContent}, '%')
AND POSTS.POST LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postContent}, '%')
AND U.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createByUser}, '%')
ORDER BY TOPICS.TOPICNO, POSTS.POSTNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOPICS( TOPICNO, SUBJECT, CREATEDBY, CREATEDAT ) VALUES ( #{form.topicNo}, #{form.subject}, #{user.id}, CURDATE() )

INSERT INTO POSTS( TOPICNO, POSTNO, POST, POST_IMG, CREATEDBY, CREATEDAT ) VALUES ( #{form.topicNo}, ( SELECT TMP.NEXT_POST_NO FROM ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(POSTNO), 0) + 1 AS NEXT_POST_NO FROM POSTS WHERE TOPICNO = #{form.topicNo} ) TMP ), #{form.primaryPost}, #{form.primaryPostImg.encodedString}, #{user.id}, CURDATE() )
DELETE POSTS, TOPICS FROM POSTS LEFT JOIN TOPICS ON POSTS.TOPICNO = TOPICS.TOPICNO WHERE TOPICS.TOPICNO = #{topicNo}
